title: Ticket #5872: Unneccessary EXCEPT()ion in starter.
description:
The following EXCEPT()ion occurs in FileTransfer::abortActiveTransfer(). It appears that the sequence is:

CStarter::~CStarter() -> JICShadow::~JICShadow() -> FileTransfer::~FileTransfer()

where the FileTransfer destructor of course tries to abort the active transfer. The problem being that, since we've already gone through DC_Exit(), daemonCore is NULL.

This may imply that we're not cleaning up properly in transferOutput(); if we've successfully completed file transfer, why do we (think we) have an active transfer?
